name: Greeting
description: An user is saying hello or initiating a conversation.

name: Goodbye
description: An user is concluding the conversation or saying goodbye

name: Question
description: An user is asking for information or clarification

name: Expression of Gratitude
description: An user is expressing thanks or gratitude

name: Negative Sentiment
description: An user is expressing dissatisfaction, disappointment, or negativity

name: Positive Sentiment
description: An user is expressing satisfaction, happiness, or positivity

name: Feedback
description: An user is providing feedback on a product, service, or experience

name: Appointment Scheduling
description: An user is attempting to schedule an appointment or set a meeting

name: Navigation Request
description: An user is asking for directions or navigation assistance

name: Information Request
description: An user is seeking general information on a topic

name: Transaction or Purchase
description: An user is attempting to make a transaction or purchase

name: Cancellation Request
description: An user wants to cancel a service or subscription

name: Confirmation
description: An user is confirming a decision, action, or information
